scripts.zk-server-test: npx vitest run ./src/test/typescript/vitest/zk-server.test.ts -t "ZK Server With Endpoints"
scripts.zk-server-db-test: npx vitest run ./src/test/typescript/vitest/zk-server.test.ts -t "ZK Server Storing and Fetching from Database"
scripts.zk-server-db-test2: npx vitest run ./src/test/typescript/vitest/zk-server.test.ts -t "ZK Server automatically Fetching from Database"
